message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8,000 by you. Considering its unique features and the benefits it can bring to you, I would like to propose a price of $7,500 for this exceptional item. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a competitive price. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.
